extendedInfo.description: See and be seen on your boat in Coastal and Inland waters using just your Android phone or tablet - Boat Beacon is the only AIS ship plotting app to share your boatâs position, provide Collision Detection and use real-time data. Specifically designed for use on the water, BoatBeacon uniquely provides Bearing, Range and Closest Point of Approach (CPA) calculations in addition to AIS ship information. Uses up-to-the-second AIS feeds unlike other apps which can be a minute or more behind real time. Transmits as well as receives AIS and is the only app that continuously monitors CPA, notifying if potential collisions are detected even when the app is in the background. Outstanding ââââââAn outstanding app, with great potential. Both interesting to use and very user friendly. This could be a life saver. Everyone who goes on the water should have this on and use it!â SundreamKey Features------------Receives AIS ship data in real-time. No VHF AIS receiver, transponder or aerial required.Over the horizon Collision, SART and MoB detection (30 miles radius) using continuous Closest Point of Approach (CPA) calculations - highlights boats that are on a potential collision course and alarms.Provides Bearing and Distance information to other boats in addition to AIS information like speed, course, location, name, length etc.Continually calculates and alarms CPA even when the app is in the background.Option to Transmit your boats position, speed and heading to Global AIS Systems and other Boat Beacon users. Transmit also works continuously in the background too when enabled.Live Map view with compass overlay which rotates with you so you can look in the direction of the ships on the map to locate them.Extensive details on other ships - including Photos.Search for boats or places nearby or worldwide by name or MMSI.Share your track and position with friends and family instantly and in real time via email, Twitter and Facebook etc.People can also follow you on Boat Beacon and leading AIS systems like Ship Finder, MarineTraffic and AIS Hub which have free web viewers available.Arm all the crews in a race with Boat Beacon and have real time updates on the race positions - inland or at sea - and have the Club-house watch too on a large screen with Boat Beacon's TV/Video Out supportKeep a watch and in touch with other boats in your flotilla when sailing in a group.Ideal for busy and popular harbours, ports and coastal areas upto 15 miles out to sea.Boat Beacon requires internet access to work. Most popular coastal areas in the US have cellular data access extending 12 or more miles out to sea. The UK has nearly complete coastal coverage out to 12 miles. AIS Ship data is provided by a network of voluntary AIS shore based stations. Some areas may not have AIS coverage.N.B. This is not an AIS transponder. You will not be visible to other ships on their AIS systems unless they also use data from the same land based AIS networks.Requirements:Android Smartphone or Tablet with GPS.Internet connection.You do not need an MMSI to use Boat Beacon and you can be seen on Boat Beacon by other Boat Beacon users without having one. However if you want to be seen on Global AIS systems like Marine Traffic, ShipFinder and AIS Hub, etc. then you will need to have and use an MMSI number. If you don't have an MMSI for your boat you can normally get one for free. In the US you can obtain a free one in a few minutes by visiting http://www.boatus.com/mmsi (the USCG approved agent) and using their online form. In the UK visit http://ask.ofcom.org.uk/help/spectrum/mmsi.Please note that continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.NOT FOR NAVIGATIONThis program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful. Boat Beacon should only be used for basic navigation reference and should not be solely relied upon to determine precise locations, proximity, distance, or direction.

reviews.title: Great tool & great customer support !
reviews.comment: This is a wonderful tool for navigating ! An alarm will sound when a vessel nears yours. Must have for boating.I feel more secure in the fog. You also can see where your buddies are located if they have Boat Beacon, and see the direction they are heading.There is a distance tool for mapping the length of your route. I had issues with my galaxy S-4 at the beginning and the support team had posted a fix within a week.The support group responds rapidly and is eager to help. A real bargain @ $9.99.    Richard Becker
reviews.author: Kris Laplante

reviews.title: Nice.
reviews.comment: Few Android apps work as smoothly or have as good an interface. A serious tool for amateur mariners.
reviews.author: Mark Albanese

reviews.title: Simple and accurate.
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this program for nearly 6 months and have found it consistently accurate.  I work as a taxi vessel operator in bc and used this program to find a vessel far off into the Georia strait.
reviews.author: Mike Miller

reviews.title: Really impressed
reviews.comment: Exceeds my expectations. Real marine aid is costly. This is great . Well done and thank you
reviews.author: John Cusick

reviews.comment: This app says there are no ships in my area. Well I\'m calling BS because I\'m looking at three U.S. tugs right now with AIS. Save your money just another phoney\tPOOR!!!!!
reviews.author: Ben Duncan

reviews.title: Very responsive service
reviews.comment: I\'m giving this app 4 stars mostly for the friendly and quick response to my problems. Although in my area of south Puget Sound near Budd and Eld Inlets coverage is pretty sparse further north seems well serviced and the app is well designed and easy to use.
reviews.author: Celia Boyce

reviews.title: Fantastic App
reviews.comment: This is a great app with a amazing support got superfast support on it yesterday thinks.
reviews.author: Kristj\303\241n Rafn Gu\303\260mundsson

reviews.title: Mr.
reviews.comment: Great App
reviews.author: Marco Garcia

reviews.title: Fantastic app
reviews.comment: Great to have information on boats around you, particularly if you do not have AIS fitted to your boat. An extremely worthwhile tool which has been very well designed and proved very reliable. No problems with working via WiFi or over Cellular data. The new CPA bearing and distance information is a great improvement and the app developer has been very responsive to suggestions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No work!!!
reviews.comment: Service unavailable!!! I can not see ships!
reviews.author: Richard Anderson

reviews.title: Turn off ????????
reviews.comment: I can\'t turn off the application. Sony Xperia sola
reviews.author: Fausto Meninno

reviews.title: Excellent ap for yachties
reviews.comment: Great program, much more useful than the others out there - especially when using on a yacht - rather than just looking at ships as a hobby. Coming into or leaving port or cruising down a coast,I can generate WiFi connection for my Nexus 7 using MiFi allowing Boat Beacon to show me Ships on the move (or about to leave a dock or about to round a headland). Lots of useful data available including Course, heading, speed etc. Thanks, look forward to future developments including a possible connection to onboard AIS engine for use offshore.
reviews.author: Stewart Burness

reviews.title: Fantastic App
reviews.comment: Works great for me and provides pretty much a fully functional AIS system at a fraction of the price.  I cannot comment on the support as I quite simply haven\'t needed it.
reviews.author: Jim Whitelaw

reviews.title: Aust Vol Coast Guard Mooloolaba & Tin Can Bay
reviews.comment: Automatic log on/off to the Electronic Sea Watch Log is now available by advising your BBid and activating Boat Beacon, thanks to assistance of the developer. Another step towards safer boating. Adrian Carroll  (thanks again Steve)
reviews.author: Adrian Carroll

reviews.title: Awesome app, awesome developer
reviews.comment: This app is a must have for anyone navigating coastal waters & busy ports. It\'s easy to quickly identify vessels & whether they are in transit or at anchor. Added bonus: the developers are lightning fast to respond to questions & reasonable requests. If you own a boat on the coast or near port areas, this could be the best $10 you ever spend on \"electronics\".
reviews.author: Sonya Liehr

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Sailing continually we find this app a good investment. We plan to use it in conjunction with our primary onboard AIS to help spot vessels not picked up by traditional VHF AIS. Programmer has done a great job and is very responsive to suggestions.  Captain Ian Engelbrecht - Worldwide Yacht Deliveries
reviews.author: ian engelbrecht

reviews.title: Great presentation, excellent service
reviews.comment: The on screen presentation suggests that the developer actually understands what someone using the app needs. I had a small issue with the app not closing down properly which was very quickly responded to and a workaround provided,. Less then 4 days later I got a follow up email advising me that an update had been released with a fix.
reviews.author: Kevan McHale

reviews.comment: Clearly a lot of thought and good work has gone into this app. Thanks for V2 update! Cool features MMSI, share function. Works on HTCZ and Samsung tab
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: very good app, works well. (Asus Transformer)
reviews.author: Richard Clutterbuck

reviews.title: Very useful app for boaters
reviews.comment: Excellent app. Worth the price.
reviews.author: Bob Hawkins
